Text:
So this is the last episode, huh? Well, that's really sad. I hope the anime will start again soon enough. 

Anyhow, thanks 1000 times for your effort with all these 175 episodes!!!!!!! I really appreciate on it. I hope you keep it up with the other anime that are still continuing.
There's more after the ending credits.
it is not a last episode dude...they'll rerun it on april/may
